mapper.select: select m.id, m.company_code, m.status, m.create_id, m.create_name, m.create_date, m.update_id, m.update_name, m.update_date, m.del_flag, m.remarks, m.code, m.picture_url, m.meeting_name, m.speaker_id, m.speaker_name, m.meeting_type, m.customer, m.meeting_date, m.style_no, m.plate_bill_code, m.meeting_address, m.meeting_no, m.is_pass, m.review_result, m.notifier_id, m.notifier_name, m.meeting_summarize, t.name as meeting_type_name from t_review_meeting as m left join t_review_meeting_type as t on m.meeting_type = t.id ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
select Max(code) code from t_review_meeting where company_code = #{companyCode}
